comment: This class was very easy. With that being said, she used AI to generate at least one of the assignments. Most topics in this class are the exact same as CSE 1322. If you did well in that class, take this class. You will find it very easy.
If you want to pass data structures, please take this professor. She genuinely wants her students to pass. Good lectures, gives extra credit, and super understanding.

She is honestly so kind! She is understanding and truly wants you to pass. If you go to her classes often, it gives you a higher chance for her to help you out when it comes to the end of the semester. She does make some mistakes, but at least she realizes them, fixes them and comes back to class to explain where she was wrong.

Professor Tasnim made passing CS3305 easier than I expected it to be. If you pay attention during her lectures and work the examples along with her (a lot of drawing out how manipulation of certain data structures works - not code heavy), you can pass the class with ease.

I was in her Operating Systems class for Spring 2024. Our schedule did not include due dates for any assignments/project. Gave unclear deadlines throughout the semester. Instructions for quizzes/assignments/project were also vague. Lectures weren't engaging. But gave makeup quizzes and bonuses. Just seemed I went through the course blind.

I took Professor Tasmin for Data Structures during her first semester of teaching. Although she was disorganized at times, she made an effort to improve her lectures as she went along. She really cared about our learning experience and would spend extra time on the most difficult concepts in the class to make sure we understood.

She's very clearly a new professor, yet still manages to convey info about certain data structures and sorting methods. She offers multiple attempts for extra credit and is a fair grader and sometimss willing to take in late work (at a reduced grade). She's very understanding but also won't let you walk over her.

New professor! She does try and give opportunities for extra credit and gives good study guides for the exams, which have not been that hard so far. However, Data Structures is a hard class for most, so I recommend taking someone else who can help you understand the material better. If you already know the material, she is a good choice.
